channel.title: Jianbo Jiao - University of Oxford
channel.description: Recent content on Jianbo Jiao - University of Oxford

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Postdoctoral Researcher in the Department of Engineering Science at the University of Oxford, and a member of the Biomedical Image Analysis (BioMedIA) group and the Visual Geometry Group (VGG), advised by Prof. Alison Noble and Prof. Andrew Zisserman. I obtained my Ph.D. in Computer Science from City University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Qingxiong Yang and Prof. Rynson W. H. Lau. I have been lucky to work as a visiting scholar in the Image Formation and Processing(IFP) group at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), advised by Prof.

item.title: Services
item.description: Conference Reviewer: AAAI 2021, WACV 2021, CVPR 2020, ECCV 2020 (Outstanding Reviewer), MICCAI 2020, AAAI 2020, IJCAI2020, ACCV 2020, ICCV 2019 (Outstanding Reviewer), CVPR 2019, MICCAI 2019, Pacific Graphics 2018 Journal Reviewer: IEEE T-PAMI, T-IP, T-MI, T-NNLS, T-CSVT, T-Cybernetics, T-MM, Multimedia, Signal Processing Letters; Neurocomputing, Journal of Visual Communication and Image Representation (Outstanding Reviewer), Computer Vision and Image Understanding, Computer Graphics Forum
